src/parallel/zsc-dgr-src/memalloc.f File Reference

Detailed Description

If FLAG is 1 then memory is allocated for the following common arrays:

  • p, p_f (pressure)
  • u, u_f (velocity)
  • phi_f (order parameter)
  • ni, ni_f (near neighbors)
  • f, fcol (order parameter distribution function)
  • g (momentum distribution function)
  • gradPhiX_f (x component of order parameter gradient)
  • gradPhiY_f (y component of order parameter gradient)
  • lapPhi_f (Laplacian of the order parameter)

and the MPI buffer arrays required by the dual grid parallel D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM. Memory is deallocated when FLAG is different from one.
